card_text: During the Main Phase, if a monster, whose effects are negated, is on the field (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can activate 1 of these effects based on where it was Special Summoned from;$N●Hand: Special Summon 1 monster from your hand.$N●Deck: Draw 2 cards.$N●Extra Deck: Destroy 1 of those monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck.$NYou can only use each effect of "The Iris Swordsoul" once per turn.
